title: web.post Response Application Programming Interface (API) Schema

body.description: The JSON response body from the external service, if any. The maximum response size from the service is 8192 bytes.

payload.description: A base64-encoded binary payload from the external service, if any. The maximum response size from the service is 8192 bytes.

status.description: If a `payload` is returned in the response, this is a 32-character hex-encoded MD5 sum of the payload or payload fragment. Useful for the host to check for any I2C/UART corruption.

cobs.description: If the web transaction returns a binary payload, `cobs` is the size of the COBS-encoded payload (in bytes).

length.description: If the web transaction returns a binary payload, `length` is the size of the unencoded payload (in bytes).

samples.description: Performs a simple HTTP or HTTPS POST request and returns the response.
